meanings.definition: A type of enzyme that breaks down proteins.
meanings.sent1: Subtilisins help to digest proteins in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use subtilisins in laboratories to study protein breakdown.
meanings.sent3: The subtilisins at the protein party were the real MVPs, breaking down all the snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to understand complex ideas was like subtilisins breaking down proteins effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The power of subtilisins to break down proteins is like a tiny army dismantling a fortress.

meanings.definition: The plural form of subtilisin, a type of enzyme.
meanings.sent1: There are different types of subtilisins used in various industries.
meanings.sent2: The researchers compared the effects of different subtilisins on protein degradation.
meanings.sent3: The subtilisins in the enzyme family reunion were excited to catch up with each other.
meanings.sent4: The impact of subtilisins on the industry was like a wave of change sweeping through.
meanings.sent5: The versatility of subtilisins makes them essential tools in many processes.
